statements: DELETE FROM WindTurbineMaintenance WHERE turbine_id = 101 AND next_maintenance_date < '2022-11-01';
DELETE FROM WindTurbineMaintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-09-01' AND maintenance_notes LIKE '%urgent%';
DELETE FROM maintenance_updates WHERE turbine_id = 2 AND update_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM turbine WHERE model = 'Model XYZ';
DELETE FROM turbine WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE schedule_id = 101 AND completion_date <= '2022-09-30';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Annual Checkup' AND technician_id = 101;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE log_date < '2022-01-01' AND schedule_id IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC);
